website_summaries.verdict: A rugged ride-on that offers quite a bit more than others. The best on the market.
pros: Boasts four-wheel drive farm tractor wheels capable of taking on most terrains
Large trailer offers endless role-play fun
FM radio adds a realistic touch that children will love
Adjustable seat with flip up armrests for customizable comfort
Two speeds with a second gear lockout option for beginners and automatic brakes
cons: A bit expensive, but well worth the features and quality

customer_reviews.title: Was Perfect for 3 months!
customer_reviews.text: Update it's July now and the rear wheels have broken and completely split!!! It's not a $300 unusable tractor! Only have had it for 3 months! He opened it on his birthday 3/29/2018 and it's July and the wheels have split.open! Love this my son rides it everyday
customer_reviews.author: A R Freehill

customer_reviews.title: Just like Daddy's!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our grandson's 3rd birthday. He LOVED it! His family lives in Vermont and his daddy has a John Deere for mowing their property, so the little guy was so proud to drive around on a tractor just like daddy's! He had problems grasping the concept of 'reverse' on the first day, but his second time on it, he was driving like a pro! The tractor is made well and is quite sturdy. We're sure he'll enjoy it for a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Vicki L. Devico

customer_reviews.title: Lies and feel I was taken for a fool...
customer_reviews.text: Very misleading Amazon description. Stated it was 4WD and it’s not, only 2WD. Did not get what I paid for. Also instructions were not only poorly written but description and pictures where poorly explained and hard to decipher. Also instructions claimed crome decal and how to instal them but they were no where to be found. Overall I would say this is a good toy but I would not have forked over a few hundred bucks if i had know this was 2WD.
customer_reviews.author: Humberto

customer_reviews.title: Nice tractor, bad instructions
customer_reviews.text: This tractor is my 5 year old son's dream come true. I give 4 stars due to the awful instructions. They arnt all together and are very limited on specifics. My other reason is the battery only lasting an hour at a time. I'd buy another battery for $60 bucks but I bbn literally have to unscrew the other battery to put the new one in. Not worth my money. Otherwise, this is the perfect toy for a 5 year old. He uses it out in the country, in the mud, up hills, down, grassy driveways.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Dissatisfied
customer_reviews.text: This item is a piece of junk. I paid nearly four hundred for the tractor and trailer for my young grandsons and after riding it 15 minutes . After looking at the book and trouble shooting we found that a wire had come off of the gear shift. We are highly dissatisfied and will not be purchasing other toys from this particular company. Fortunately my husband is mechanical and is able to keep repairing the tractor. As for the trailer the cheap plastic pin that connects the trailer to the tractor broke. There was nothing in the trailer so it wasn't due to having too much weight.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t last.
customer_reviews.text: My so absolutely ADORED this tractor.... while it lasted. It lasted less than a year and we had to buy replacement batteries before that. Right around the one year mark the pedal stopped working. We were sent a replacement part, it worked again for maybe a day and now it no longer runs for more than 5 minutes (and very slowly at that), fully charged battery or not. My son is so sad and is begging for a new tractor but there’s no way we can pay ANOTHER $300 for a toy in just over a year, very disappointing!!
customer_reviews.author: Tswan

customer_reviews.title: WORST PRODUCT EVER AND CUSTOMER SERVICE EVEN WORST.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and spent quite a bit. The product came in defective, the battery doesn't work. I tried contacting Amazon and they keep ignoring my request to return the item. They told me to call the manufacturer, which I did and they said they don't handle returns and that I have to contact amazon directly. This has been the worse experience by far, and Amazon refuses to take any accountability. They expect me to keep a defective item and don't accommodate the return. Horrible customer service to say the least.
customer_reviews.author: denisse

customer_reviews.title: Complete junk
customer_reviews.text: Update* - less than two weeks of use and the tractor is completley inoperable. This was a giant waste of money! Let's face it... all kids toys are frustrating to put together. However, this is the worst I have encountered. The instructions are absolutely terrible and not intuitive in any sense. Good luck! Also much lower quality than I was expecting. Yeah it looks cute and cruises fast, but not good rigidity. I would take back the purchase if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: This tractor is a WINNER!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandson for his 3rd birthday. This is the best gift ever. My grandson loves his tractor and rides it constantly. I highly recommend you buy a second battery so there is always one fully charged when needed.This tractor is plenty powerful enough for my grandson. He loves second gear because he likes to go fast. The only problem we encountered were the wheels. To help them move over any terrain, my son-in-law put duct tape around the back wheels and this made a world of difference. Eventually the duct tape wore down, so he drove screws into the back wheels around the circumference and this works great and is a more permanent solution.
customer_reviews.author: Carla R

customer_reviews.title: Battery arrived dead and will not charge
customer_reviews.text: Just purchased and my son really enjoyed riding it, but it died only after 2 hours of use after a full charge. SAFETY CONCERN!! The first thing my son asked was “where’s the on off button?” Nope there isn’t one. It’s really difficult for my son and daughter to learn to exit the tractor without stepping on the gas. This has caused major accidents while trying to exit. Next, the battery died after about two hours and will not recharge. Sad!! Finally, the 1-800 number for customer service is not valid!!! Omg don’t buy from this company!!!
customer_reviews.author: PH

customer_reviews.title: Awesome looking tractor!
customer_reviews.text: We recently purchased this for my nephew for Christmas, and it was not easy to put together. We ran into several issues including the steering wheel, trailer pin, hood harness, and missing a couple stickers. Once we got past all of that it was pretty straightforward and has more power than expected. I am giving this 4 stars instead of 2 or 3, because when i contacted Amazon to see about getting a partial refund for the items mentioned above, they ended up refunding the entire purchase even when i was outside of the return/refund policy. They also did not make us send it back. They made it right, which is was all i really wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Traci

customer_reviews.title: Great for ages 3plus
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived used. Paid nearly 300$ to be given a used, scratched item and what sucks is we did not notice until halfway through assembly. Customer service was HORRIBLE I did not have the patience to deal with their indifference so I eventually spoke to a supervisor who refunded the difference between the "new item" price and the "used item" price. This was a gift for my sons birthday so simply returning it the day prior was not an option. Overall he likes it but really prefers to ride in the trailer while my daughter drives him around. He just turned two though so I'm sure he will grow to love it.
customer_reviews.author: Minnie The Moochie

customer_reviews.title: My 2 1/2 yr old LOVES it
customer_reviews.text: We recently moved to some acreage and bought a tractor for the home. We just knew we had to get our kid this tractor and he rode it for an hour non stop the first day. After a few months he still enjoys hauling around branches or balls or cars in the trailer. Having the radio is a cool addition. I like that you can control the speeds as well b/c I don't think he would have been ready for the fast speed on day 1. Also love the reverse function - I don't have to go out to help him if he gets stuck - he just backs right up and keeps going.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Arceneaux

customer_reviews.title: Grandson LOVES it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: We had Amazon put it together for us. He did it in 45 min. My 3yr old grandson got it for Christmas so he has not used it many times. But, he LOVES it. He drove it out of the garage at Christmas. He stopped right away and loaded up a couple rocks. He never stopped smiling. He ran over and gave me a big hug. He had a great time driving all over the yard and picked up leaves. The trailer was a big hit. Glad we got this one with the trailer. Can’t really comment about battery life, just been too cold to ride for long periods.
customer_reviews.author: Janifer

customer_reviews.title: Great power and battery
customer_reviews.text: My 2 (Almost 3) year old is inlove with this! It’s easily operated and very maneuverable. But I will say be prepared for the power! I ordered it because of that so it didn’t disappoint, but it surprised him at first. Now he won’t even ride it in setting one 😅.. it’s powerful enough to ride in grass and still move at a fast pace. He loves the little wagon to put toys in and the battery life is really good. The plastic is a little more cheap feel than I expected so that was disappointing, but that’s my only complaint..overall I would say if your considering it go ahead, a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT LITTLE TRACTOR AND CART!
customer_reviews.text: Grandson (2 1/2) LOVES his Tractor and Cart!! It arrived ahead of schedule and all the pieces must have been there because I heard no complaints about putting it together (his Dad assembled it). Our grandson rides it all over their yard and drive way with no problems in the low speed mode, even though he is about 39" tall and weighs over 40 lbs. It has good traction on grass--even when it is kind of wet-- and there is no problem with it on concrete or blacktop. I highly recommend this tractor and cart and this seller!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Dietrich

customer_reviews.title: Best Purchase Ever!
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our grandsons 3rd Birthday. He absolutely loves his tractor. We have a little bit of land. A nice garden that he drives out to daily. A hill that he loves to play on and his tractor goes up it very nicely. I was worried he might have a problem driving. Nope! Picked it up immediately. I love his tractor. He loves his tractor. Nice to see his paw out on his tractor, the neighbors out on theirs and now he had his own. And loves the radio! All works great. No issues at all!
customer_reviews.author: MLH

customer_reviews.title: Can handle any terrain
customer_reviews.text: First time using this tractor and we are super impressed. This tractor is awesome! It handles well over all the uneven terrain in our cow pasture including huge chunks of grass, cow holes, ditches, etc. After tacking it out in our pasture im convinced it could handle any terrain. I love the two speeds because there are times we need our 3 year old to go slower but this thing can boogie on the fast speed!
customer_reviews.author: Weston

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST!
customer_reviews.text: This tractor was purchased for my 2.5 year old son and boy has he put the miles on it! He LOVES this tractor. He can easily reach the pedal and work the shift. I like that it has a slow and high speed. At first, we blocked the high speed and it was easily removed when my son was ready to go faster. This tractor is tough. My daughter's motorized Ford 250 often gets stuck just driving in the grass. This tractor goes through it all! My daughter is 5.5 and she can easily ride it too. Probably the best purchase I've ever made for my son!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun for children!
customer_reviews.text: Gift for grandson. Enjoys riding it tremendously. Arrived partially assembled but still took several hours to complete. Instructions are not the easiest to follow. Battery life is ok. You get about 2 hrs per charge. FM radio is kind of silly for small children. Also, each time you change the AA radio batteries the steering wheel needs to be taken off. Several good U tube videos if you get stuck with assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Tony L

customer_reviews.title: your kid will love it
customer_reviews.text: My grandson absolutely LOVES his tractor! I've never seen him so excited. (He's 3 1/2). Putting it together took quite a while, so bring your patience. Battery lasts for a day's play, then recharge at night. It moves pretty darn fast on high speed, but there's a way to block that and keep it on low speed. Can't back up when the wagon is attached. Very pleased with purchase in spite of the price tag. Hope it lasts!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This momma is not a happy camper!
customer_reviews.text: If I could give 0 stars, I would. We purchased this for my son for Christmas and less than 3 months later, the crazy thing no longer charges. Of course, this happens after the point of being able to return it so now I have to either buy another battery and hope it works or buy another tractor. This momma is not a happy camper!
customer_reviews.author: BRITTANY VALENTINE

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars***** excellent tractor toy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this well over a year ago and absolutely no regrets! My son literally is on it every nice day there is since we got it. The battery last many hours of fun, and riding time. He enjoys pulling the wagon, with tools and whatever else he can find. I definitely suggest if your child is anything like mine, to charge overnight for the next day! Because he loves to drive that tractor. This held up longer than other cars that I’ve bought in the past that are ride on for kids.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Marie Meltz

customer_reviews.title: Don’t hesitate to purchase
customer_reviews.text: Top notch toys for the kids. My son has been using this constantly for almost two years, and he still loves it as much as the first day he drove it. Having two forward speeds is fantastic. The low speed was initially used as he was 2yrs old when he first started driving it, and after a year or so he was ready for the faster speed. The battery still holds a long charge.
customer_reviews.author: J. R. K.

customer_reviews.title: Great safe electric tractor for a toddler.
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old loves it. His face when he was able to use the 2nd faster speed was very adorable. The directions need to be better. I am afraid of the durability of the wheels, 1 already wobbles. Its 2020, no reason why you can't have a flap on the side to plug it in to charge, and maybe upgrades like a bigger battery. The tow link needs to be easier to take on and off. A bit too expensive for what it is. Hoping it will last 5 years.
customer_reviews.author: TM

customer_reviews.title: We are very disappointed in this John Deere tractor
customer_reviews.text: We are very disappointed in this John Deere tractor. I did not last 3 months before it started falling apart. The front end has fallen off and can not be put back on. One of the tires busted and has a hole in it. This was a birthday gift for our 3 year old grandson and He is very disappointed that he cannot ride his tractor. We would like for this item to be replaced or we should be refunded. Thank you for your attention and response to this matter.
customer_reviews.author: gayle adams

customer_reviews.title: Slick tires
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for our 2 1/2 year old grandson. It only took a few minutes of practice to learn to use it. The tractor and trailer look great. My disappointment lies with how slick the tires are. Our yard has lots of leaves and the tractor really struggles to go up any kind of incline, especially if there are leaves. We are going to figure out how to add some rubber traction to the tires. Definitely only good for flat surfaces.
customer_reviews.author: Roostermom

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and son loves it
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this thing. A little part of it came cracked but it is covered by the hood of the tractor when closed. Assembly was simple. The hardest part was putting the darn stickers on straight but I managed. We keep it on the charger when not in use so haven’t had it die yet and we take it to the park where he has ridden for extensive periods. Speed 2 is actually Decently fast but not dangerously so. My only concern was the wheels wearing out from sliding on concrete but I found out that they sell replacements so it’s no longer a concern. Quality is great and it was worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Big Hit!
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old granddaughter absolutely loves this. She goes in the horse arena with footing and flies around in 2nd gear which is pretty fast but it is safe in that controlled environment. I think you can lock it into first gear if you want it to be slower. It has a radio which was quite a surprise to her so sometimes she gets off and dances to the music. lol I might have to buy a 2nd one in a year or two as the younger granddaughter will need her own farm tractor. Teaches some play work ethics as they deliver hay and rocks in the attachable cart. This purchase was a big hit!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Owned it for a yr now.Great gift for price. Sons loves it
customer_reviews.text: *updated review* One year out with this john deer tractor. Its holding up pretty well the smoke stack fell off. But doesnt really matter rest of the tractor is still in goodshape. Battery life isnt as it was a yr ago but my son drives this tractor all over the neighborhood on grass gravel cement and pavement. He even picks up wood for the fire pit. He loads the trailer with wood dirt flowers and of course his toys. ordered second battery. Its worth it with all the use hes gotten out of it. Got this for my son for his second birthday. He has no problem driving it battery life is reasonable. Putting together wasnt hard.
customer_reviews.author: Jennyanddre

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Son is in love. By far his favorite toy on planet. We have it locked into slow mode and battery lasts a good 2 days. We may buy backup battery. He is 3.5 and rough on it. It is very sturdy though: we have 3 uneven acres and he never gets stuck. Great toy I got the protection because kids are rough on toys but not sure We will need it?!?!
customer_reviews.author: shanchase

customer_reviews.title: Overall the tractor is fun. It fits my 3 year old perfectly and ...
customer_reviews.text: Overall the tractor is fun. It fits my 3 year old perfectly and he really loves it. A couple problems we've run into are that the trailer is a piece of junk. Flimsy and impossible to attach to the tractor. The other problem is that it stopped working after a week and my son has been quite gentle with it! Plan on calling the company next week because it sounds like it might be fixable but, what a pain in the neck!! Not looking forward to the hassle of excanging it if I can't fix it...
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Leichter

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny, plenty if power, completely satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: I just received this today and assembled it within an hour. The instructions were pretty straight forward and easy to follow. My son loves this toy. He is 2 and a half and has gotten the functionality pretty quickly. He loves being able to put things on the trailer to play with, but most impressive is the sheer power of it. I can't express how powerful this thing is and he is only using it at speed 1. He still can use a whole other speed once he is ready, but for now he can go through just about any obsticle or terrain at the current speed. This thing is amazing and I highly highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Dio

customer_reviews.title: stickers first, trailer stoppers go inside of the wheels after Metal clip outside, Headlight tricky.
customer_reviews.text: Came yesterday July 1st, few days early (live 1 state away from indiana), had it together in a little over an hour. Came with battery and charger just like it says I'm the description. Battery was almost full by the time I had assembled the rest it was fully charged. My son absolutely loves it and worth every penny just for that. FR fender was a bit deformed but I'm sure it can be adjusted no big deal. Biggest thing I wish I had put the stickers on first. Much harder once assembled. Will update asap
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Take a lickin but keeps on tickin
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for my son in December of 2015. He STILL loves this thing. It’s actually pretty darn fast at 4.5 mph. The little trailer broke off at the hinge early on but my son didn’t really care for that anyway. Battery life is mediocre but I think that’s true of all these ride on toys. Overall it’s a great product and my son loves it. Uses it a LOT!
customer_reviews.author: RD

customer_reviews.title: Assembles easy; seems very well built.
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was straight-forward with the instructions. Un-boxing was easy. Everything went together as it should! =) Only issue I had was the tractor rear axle bolt covers (yellow w/ 2-prongs). The axle & nut stick out too far for the cover to fit. I just drilled out the center of the cover with a stepper drill. Looks fine & better than no-cover. See pic. Very happy to see the battery compartment accommodates a larger "aftermarket" battery by using a removable spacer with the stock battery.
customer_reviews.author: DanTheMan

customer_reviews.title: Fun tractor for my son
customer_reviews.text: The tractor is great and just like what you would buy in a store. Shipping was fast with no issues. When putting the tractor together the instructions aren’t the best but it wasn’t too difficult to put together. The company needs to take more precautions when packaging the tractor though. There were several plastic pieces that had stress on them and had turned white where it was bent. Not a deal breaker because no parts were broke but they easily could have. Overall, satisfied with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun while it lasted....
customer_reviews.text: I orded two and they were great for a few months. Went forward and reverse. Attached end piece fit fine, made it ride a bit slower..so ended up not always using the back trailer. Road faster without it. However...these both ended up breaking down. They were used daily all spring summer and fall and by winter one broke down. By end of year both stopped working. Pieces and parts broke off. Cheap plastic. Throughout use the battery life window grew shorter and shorter. They were fun while they lasted ..but at $1,000 for two...not worth it. If they were priced $300 or even $400 for both...the 5 months of play would have been worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Maxine L.

customer_reviews.title: Sweet ride for my little dude
customer_reviews.text: My two year old loves his tractor! It moves around fairly easily, including one grass. It only gets stuck on really uneven surfaces but that’s expected. My only complaint is that the trailer constantly falls off so that’s a little annoying to reconnect. My husband said the batteries for the radio will be a pain to replace but whatever - we didn’t get it for that. My son loves riding around in this thing!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded expectations
customer_reviews.text: Realistic design just like the big boys!!! Made in the USA with quality components. Minimal assembly required. This is our sons favorite toy and he wants to ride it daily. He rides around our neighborhood sidewalks and cul de sacs. It is powerful enough to transition between concrete into grass and up our driveway which has a slight grade with no issue. It even does well in our backyard. The trailer is neat and he always looks back to make sure it is connected and ok. The radio is a nice touch. Our son is two and learned how to drive it alone in three days. He absolutely loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Midweste

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed with this toy
customer_reviews.text: Worst purchase ever!!! Do not waste your money. We had purchased this john deere b/c my 2 year old learned to drive my 4 year olds. Our other john deere like this was called power force which runs and is made much better. This one falls apart and is much slower. We could not return the product b/c of the battery. Peg Perego did send me a new battery which seemed to help with the speed. My kids don't even want to ride it they want to ride the old one :( So they are still fighting over them which I thought was going to be resolved by purchasing a new one.
customer_reviews.author: KBouc

customer_reviews.title: Best toy ever
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to spend so much money on this item, but I am glad I did. My son has used it daily for the past two years. He hauls toys in the trailer. It has been extremely durable and drives on both grass and pavement with ease. It easily climbs the rolling hills of our Tennessee home. The battery life is excellent as long as you charge it after each usage. At two years, I have had to replace the rear tires and one of the drive motors, but this was only due to the abnormally heavy use by my son. He actually wore holes in the tires. The repair was really easy, and parts are readily available online.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Good product, Excellent Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: When I first assembled the tractor, the low forward speed and reverse didn't work. Customer Service was excellent and so were the helpful videos. I was able to find a wire that had come loose in shipments, now everything is GREAT. A 4 year-old girl is going to be VERY happy this Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Hilsz

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 3 year old for Christmas. He LOVES IT! It was easy to put together, took maybe an hour or so most of it was already assembled. It charges fast, hold a charge for a decent amount of time too. It does work in the grass. The speed is pretty fast on the highest setting, which can be a bit nerve racking at times but he got the hang of it. It seems durable and I am hoping it last for awhile. He has so much fun riding it around and pulling items in the trailer part. Would recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: anastasia hood

customer_reviews.title: The battery is terrible, only lasts for less than an hour's worth ...
customer_reviews.text: We have had the tractor assembled less than 24 hours and so far the headlights/taillights have all fallen off, and just now right before I brought it inside for the night the "smokestack" fell off. The right front tire guard fell off within 15 minutes of the boys driving it. The battery is terrible, only lasts for less than an hour's worth of driving. Don't plan on your kids being able to pull each other around, the trailer is a piece of trash (trailer trash!) that is completely unstable and falls apart when someone blows on it. Amazon made it right (I LOVE Amazon!!!!) but the product is not good.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Just purchased this for my soon to be 3 year old. He loves it. Wish the directions for set up were a little bit more clear. Did resort to you tube for videos on some parts. Goes a lot faster than I anticipated but my son does not seem to care about that. It does have the ability to keep it locked so they can not. The only down fall I think is the reverse needs to be held up while reversing which can be a bit tricky for him. All in all worth every penny so far.
customer_reviews.author: Leanns Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Great Present
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the fastest and strongest climbing battery powered kids ride out there! Directions basically suck, but watch a video on line and you'll be fine. There is a reason there is a speed lock out for smaller kids, but older kids will love it. My granddaughter will be four in July and she stays on the top speed most of the time and doesn't get bored like other riders... Highly Recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Hawkd57

customer_reviews.title: 5 Year Old loves it - So do we.
customer_reviews.text: Our 5 year old drives this on our neighborhood walks. It has significantly reduced the amount of carrying required by parents. Made it 15 minutes on 1st gear. No idea if it would make it around a second time on a single charge, though.
customer_reviews.author: Aungen

customer_reviews.title: Great little tractor and great customer service
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for my 2 year old son, he absolutely loves tractors! I was very pleased with the customer service when we had to send the first one back because it only had second gear. The company sent out the replacement as soon as I filled out the return request. My son loves it and would drive it all day if we let him. I would recommend this little tractor to anyone. Good product and great customer service. By the way my little girls love it also!! Cause girls can drive tractors too!
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Nice tractor kids can get a lot of use out of
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 3 year old daughter. My husband and brother in law put it together in about an hour. Our daughter loves it but was a little nervous with the speed. She only had it on the low speed and is building up courage to go faster. There is a block on the higher speed we can remove once she's ready. This is a nice feature... The radio is pretty cool, she loves that
customer_reviews.author: katie

customer_reviews.title: radio is a joke, evidently?
customer_reviews.text: We put this together last night but the radio doesn't work. The knob to turn it on and off does that, but the square button doesn't work or move at all, and the triangle one moves, but does nothing. The one channel that is nothing but static and you can't change the channel to pick up anything. Anyone else have this problem? The tractor battery has to charge for 18 hours before you can use it, so we haven't tried any of that yet. Will late this afternoon when it's ready.
customer_reviews.author: katie

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: You will never regret your decision to purchase this tractor. EVER! Got this after visiting friends who had the same tractor & am so glad we did. It is durable, it is easy to put together. It has 2 speed settings and there’s definitely some power behind the motor. My son books it across our field now that he’s got the hang of it. It goes on all terrain. Gravel, dirt, tall grass.. you name it. Bonus? It has a working radio.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Colver

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little tractor!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son’s 4th birthday and he loves it!! He’s tall for his age and fits on it well and has room to grow. He loves working the radio but needs a little help hooking and unhooking the trailer. He loves helping me haul veggies back from the garden and follows his dad around “mowing” the lawn.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: His favorite gift
customer_reviews.text: This was a huge hit. Our son was 4 1/2 when he received this as a gift, and about a year later, he still loves it! We purposely set the speed to 1, so that after several months of use we could increase the speed, and it would feel somewhat new to him all over again. The radio is awesome, but his favorite part is the trailer. He loads it up with his favorite toys, and has even tied a sled to the back to tow around. After a year of hard and rowdy use, he as only overturned it once. I would definitely recommend this for any child that loves the outdoors and/or cars and trucks!
customer_reviews.author: Alana

customer_reviews.title: Great toy my only complaint is that my children tend ...
customer_reviews.text: Great toy my only complaint is that my children tend to use the black "exhaust pipe" as a handle (which it does have a hand grip on it) and almost immediately the small screw backed out and the part tore off. The trailer for the back also does not stay connected very well. Otherwise, fun toy!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Takami

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Overall I think this will be a good product. Haven't used it outside yet but I bought two because I have twins. A lot of plastic so I hope it is study and doesn't break easily. We shall see. Kids are pretty rough with things. Has a radio which my kids will love. Assembly was easy until we got to the steering wheel. The holes wouldn't line up at all. I cried it was so frustrating. With some scrapping of the plastic on the wheel we finally got it to work (took over 30 minutes on the wheel and a lot of swearing). My kids will love it so it is worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Anne

customer_reviews.title: Great battery life.  Great product
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this. I researched so many different ride on tractors for my three years old and worried about battery life and durability. This has a great battery life. My yard is not level and it pulls the hills and inclines with little effort. Does great on gravel and grass. Worth every penny. He is so happy with this and loves to take it everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina jones

customer_reviews.title: Issue with the trailer
customer_reviews.text: Omg! Trying to hook the trailer gave us much grief. There are grooves but we had to force with some serious strength the connector into place with a screwdriver. My husband said the assembly instructions were awful. None of the parts are labeled. Other than that, fun ride for my 3-year-old son and it is fast! Battery doesn't last long. Radio is ok, some static but only in spots. I bought it when the price dropped during Black Friday. Overpriced toy though.
customer_reviews.author: C. Solis

customer_reviews.title: My 3 year old grandson loves his John Deere Tractor and Trailer.
customer_reviews.text: Got this tractor and trailer for my 3 year old grandsons birthday. He helped me put everything together before we charged the battery over night. The next day he was excited to try out his new tractor. It took awhile for him to get used to the throttle as the tractor lunges forward and sorta snaps his head back when he depressed throttle. He was a little apprehensive in the beginning because of the power the tractor has and took awhile for him to figure out how to steer. After a couple days he has now mastered how to drive his tractor and enjoys his time playing with it.
customer_reviews.author: Papaw

customer_reviews.title: Drives great!
customer_reviews.text: My grandkids absolutely love this tractor and trailer. They want to ride it all the time. The only problem is that every once in a while when they are turning the wheel it makes a very loud and irritating screeching sound. We have to put sound reducing headphones on them now to ride it. Going to reach out to the manufacturer to find out if there is something we can do to fix this, because other than the noise, it works great. But the noise hurts the kids ears and scares them. It seems to be coming from one of the rear wheel areas. If we can fix the noise, then this would be a 5 star product.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Elenbaas

customer_reviews.title: Not full functional or returnable
customer_reviews.text: This item did not come with a remote control. It was not difficult to assemble, just time consuming. After spending a couple hours assembling, following all instructions, and letting it charge for the full 18 hours, I learned that only one of 3 gears works and only one of the 2 rear tires turns. The one back tire will spin in second gear, but nothing happens in first gear or reverse. This item is also not returnable, so be wary when ordering.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Hall

customer_reviews.title: Great little tractor
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old son flipped when he saw this waiting for him on Christmas morning, he was so excited!! It’s a great ride on toy, very realistic and it even has a real working radio! He has only got to ride on it a couple times since it’s been so cold and snowy but he is so in love with his little tractor!! Assembly was a little tedious and a couple plastic panels didn’t want to line up correctly, it took some patience but eventually it all came together!
customer_reviews.author: Marie39

customer_reviews.title: Great toy, very powerful
customer_reviews.text: Very powerful toy, has no problem getting through the grass. There is a fast setting that is probably too fast for most toddlers but you can restrict it to slow. The trailer is flimsy and not intended for passengers however kids will be kids and use it as such. When they use it the trailer flips over routinely. I reinforced the structure of the trailer to prevent that.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Davidson

customer_reviews.title: Love this tractor
customer_reviews.text: If you're at ease with tools, then this tractor was very easy to assemble in 45 minutes. The hardest part was placing the decals on the tractor. A friend has had one for 5 years, and it's still going strong. We bought this for our 3year old granddaughter, and she has such fun riding it. It took a bit of practice for her to use reverse when she got stuck, but she's now a pro. I'd recommend this as a special gift for boys and girls.
customer_reviews.author: Delighted in Reno.

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: I sent as a 2nd birthday gift for my grandnephew. My niece reported excellent reviews. Sturdy and well constructed. Arrived on time and in great condition. The paint color and decals are perfect. It requires definite parental supervision (But who would allow their 2 year old to use it unsupervised?). PLEASE DON'T GREAT ITEM. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: "lwb555"

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Experience - Still not working
customer_reviews.text: Summary: - Difficult to put together (had to watch others struggle through it on youtube) - Poor factory assembly of battery (Tractor did not start) - Was forced to run a bunch of tests on my own to figure out problem (thank goodness my father-in-law was an electrical engineer) - Sent detailed email explaining issue AND talked to someone about it...still sent the wrong replacement part, with intense instructions on breaking down the entire vehicle to install (thats their warranty policy?) - In second attempt to get correct replacement cost, required to send photos (why not the first time?) Sent my photos and am crossing my fingers. Would not recommend and I will personally not be buying from them again.
customer_reviews.author: John Horn

customer_reviews.title: Best ride on
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 2-year-old son, who loves tractors. He is able to steer and ride on his own (we keep the faster speed locked). This tractor is his favorite part of life right now. The battery seems to hold up very well—we always charge the battery when he is finished riding, as recommended in the instructions. There was one small plastic piece missing when we received this in the mail, but it is purely cosmetic and doesn’t impact functioning.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: a strong little tractor!
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old loves it. He puts his 1.5 yr old sister in the trailer and she loves it just as much. When she's not in the trailer, my boy is putting sticks, rocks, whatever he can find into the trailer. So far, I have not removed the limiter on the shifter so the tractor is only in 1st gear but I have a feeling I'll take the gear lock off one of these days. It took my kid a while to figure out that he has to HOLD the shifter in place in order to drive in reverse.
customer_reviews.author: C. Becerra

customer_reviews.title: Great toy and quality, awesome detachable trailer, my 3 year old LOVES!!!  Buy the horn too- good little addition.
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect toy for my 3 year old!! He LOVES it and spent about 6 hours on Christmas driving around our kitchen island and living room couches (there's too much snow to drive it outside). You'll need some time to assemble, but it wasn't bad. I bought the John Deere toy horn that pops into the steering wheel and he loves that too. I debated between this and the Gator and am SO glad I went with this one that has the detachable trailer. He loves it so much and loads and unloads it, attaches and detaches it it all by himself.
customer_reviews.author: ShawnAndTiffany

customer_reviews.title: 3 yr old is OBSESSED
customer_reviews.text: To say this tractor was a hit would be greatly understated. Both my 3yr old son and 2yr old daughter love this thing. Two speed options. High speed is very fast! He loves it. Battery life is longer than his other battery ride-on toys. Assembly wasn’t easy but not crazy hard either. I would suggest putting it together before letting your little one know it’s there.
customer_reviews.author: VC85

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but well made. Shipped quite fast
customer_reviews.text: Bought for our 2 year old grandson’s birthday. He loves it. He is still learning how to steer and maintain speed ( it is locked on low for now). He loves the wagon and goes around filling it up with sticks! It was pricey but appears to be made well. It has a radio which he turns on first thing. I wish it was remote control but it isn’t.
customer_reviews.author: geina creviston

customer_reviews.title: Little guy loves it and after one year of heavy use it’s holding up
customer_reviews.text: My son adores this gift, currently it’s winter and he can’t wait to get back on his John Deere tractor and drive! He was two when he first received the gift and drove it fairly well but we restricted his speed to one until he got the hang of things. Speed two is pretty fast but he handles the turns well. The little tailgate sold it for him! It does come off with a fairly good bump but my son is riding this tractor all around the yard up and down hill. The battery lasts awhile especially since my son only drives on the lawn which is indicated as a shorter battery life than driving on a sidewalk or driveway.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Assemble was easy, battery life is better than expected, and nothing slow the little tractor down. It travels over tall grass with ease up and down hills and over gravel. I am very pleased. My only negative comment is that the trailer does not latch onto the tractor hitch. The plastic 'pin' is not able to turn to be placed into a lock position to hold the trailed to the tractor.
customer_reviews.author: Robert P.

customer_reviews.title: Assembly is tricky if you don't read the whole thing
customer_reviews.text: i didn't see the parts list until after i had assembled the thing. i read through the instructions and the parts list was at the end...go figure. needless to say it was a chore because the pictures are terrible. also, i could not get the battery door off of the radio - the screw stripped and so we are not using the radio.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie B Severt

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the not so easy assembly.
customer_reviews.text: My son loves tractors cause of Blippi on youtube so we bought this for his birthday and he absolutely loves it. The black and white instructions were of little help. Thank god for YT. My son has hours of fun on his own tractor.
customer_reviews.author: Dopamine

customer_reviews.title: It just keeps going and going!
customer_reviews.text: I thought for sure this thing would have been sold at a yardsale years ago. It has made it through 1 boy and going through its second. It has carried full bails of straw and every other toy we own. It is well loved and the little things do fall off over time. So what if the tail lights, head lights, and muffler fell off. It just keeps on going. We just took a quarantine walk and it made it on a 3 mile loop. Original battery and charger. 6 years after purchase it keeps on going.
customer_reviews.author: Wes Parsons

customer_reviews.title: Cute little tractor with no remote control
customer_reviews.text: This does not come with a remote control, so that was very disappointing—but my fault I should have read better. This little tractor is super cute though! I like the speed setting, so that’s a good feature. I like it but I wish it had a remote control bc my little guy doesn’t quite have the push the gas and steer combo down yet. The washer on the steering wheel came off within a week, so that is super annoying—I need to contact the company for a replacement. And the plastic around the hood has come apart so it isn’t snug inside anymore. I wouldn’t buy this again. It holds a charge ok—less in 2nd speed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing but battery only lasted 8 months...
customer_reviews.text: We love this! Our son is obsessed and will ride for an hour! The trainer is amazing and useful. This toy was one of the best things we’ve ever purchased. Wish it could grow with him. So sad though we purchased in October and in June (8 months) - the battery would not charge.... and most of winter we didn’t use only a little in basement.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Grandson loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Instructions could have been clearer. Bought this for my 3 year old grandson and he loves it. Tires don't grip well on damp grass or leaves. Took care of that issue by putting screws in the tires.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Super fun and fast!
customer_reviews.text: To say my boys love this tractor is an understatement. I can’t keep them off of it. My 4 yr old got this for his birthday and probably rode it for no less than 12 hours that weekend. We did go buy a second battery that was slightly larger so we could keep one charged at all times. My 4 yr old and 5 yr old fit on it great and both love riding it. Oh, and it’s FAST! Also has a real working radio which my kids have fun with too.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Get a extra battery
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my grandson. He loves it. We all love it. The only thing is the battery goes down fast. So if ordering get an extra battery.
customer_reviews.author: Marlene R.

customer_reviews.title: Built like a real John deere tractor.
customer_reviews.text: OK, this is pretty expensive for a kid toy, but it is well built, large, easy to use, has lots of kid friendly features (radio, cart, real steering wheel, etc.). My grandson loves it and plays with it every day. He is 2 years ols now. I know that he will grow into it soon and can play "farmer" with me.
customer_reviews.author: GamePlayer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty ticked off that the axel for the trailer was ...
customer_reviews.text: Pretty ticked off that the axel for the trailer was the wrong size. The lock washers wouldn't lock on and the axel wouldn't snap into the trailer because it wasn't the right size. Had to spend additional money at Lowes to fix this problem. Lack of quality control reflected in my rating.
customer_reviews.author: Al Beebe

customer_reviews.title: Great toy, FYI Battery needs charged for 18 hours prior to use.
customer_reviews.text: 2YO loves his tractor. Only thing is I wish it tracked mile or hours ran, I would love to know how many hours/ miles my kid spends on the thing. lol MAKE SURE TO READ INSTRUCTIONS!!! Note that in the instructions, you have to charge the battery for 18 HOURS prior to use or the warranty is void. So if you are hoping to have your kid ride theirs when they open the box, you may want to hide it the day before so you can charge the battery.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Fast and stable but radio is not reliable
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old daughter this this is the best thing ever! She is very tall (45") and can still ride comfortably. Battery it comes with is short life so get a second if you have a speed demon :) On speed 2 it only lasts about 30-40 minutes, sounds like a long time until they loose power on the back of 5 acres and you have to carry the thing back in.
customer_reviews.author: KnightReN

customer_reviews.title: Bought for my two going on twenty great grand son
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my two going on twenty great grand son. He rides it every day and went very quickly from slow to fast speed setting. A little difficult to assemble, but well worth the extra effort to see the joy on his face. It is well constructed, and is holding up nicely under the conditions that our little expert puts it through! We did put the trailer up until he can understand how to back up with it attached. The wheel assembly for the trailer seems to be lacking in the way it is attached to the frame. Though it was bought used, you could never tell it. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Rick Shearer

customer_reviews.title: John Deere stickers don’t mean John Deere-like quality.
customer_reviews.text: Instructions not clearest for every step. Struggled with some parts due to inexact dimensions/tolerances, especially steering wheel-to-shaft assembly (rod slightly short) and wagon hitch pin (won’t lock because too tight). Screw in parts bag bent upon arrival. Design a bit wonky when you have to take off steering wheel to access radio unit which will require battery change at some point. Seems durable. Easy to recharge.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: grandson loves it
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for my 3 year old grandson for Christmas and he absolutely loves it. He drives it on our farm to pick up ears of corn and put them in his wagon. He gets mad because the combine doesn't get them all so he thinks it's his job. The tractor goes just about anywhere he wants to go as long as its on high speed. I wish the battery lasted a little longer.
customer_reviews.author: Sassy T

customer_reviews.title: So fun for the tractor lover! 🚜
customer_reviews.text: This was such a hit. Our son is not even two and has learned to press the pedal. It goes pretty fast in a 2, but not too fast. My 5 year old can ride it too! Handles well in the grass also. Long battery. Installation not too bad. GREAT Purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: It goes!
customer_reviews.text: My tall four year old son loves this tractor! We have gone through SEVERAL power wheels with three boys and this one is awesome. Finally they make both rear wheels turn! My husband always had to modify the other styles so my kids could ride on the grass and gravel. This little tractor goes right through deep mud. It has a good bit of torque and stays charged pretty long.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: My 2 year old loves this!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our two year old son for Christmas Day! He fell in love with them over at the neighbors house and we knew he wanted one of his own. We are still working on getting him to steer around thing but he will get the hang of it soon. Product looks great, had all of the pieces, took about 2 hours to fully assemble, arrived quickly. Definitely worth the money we spent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best battery powered machine and good price! Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: My sons favorite toy by far!! I think this is even better than his corvette since this can go in the grass. 1st gear is slow but excellent to teach them how to steer and stop. 2nd gear has a nice lock that you can undo and then the fun really begins! I am surprised how quick the thing is and how long the battery lasts. Highly recommend this brand and the wagon is a great addition, I get lots of help picking up sticks in the yard now!
customer_reviews.author: J Calvert

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tractor. Fairly easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Awesome tractor. Fairly easy to put together. My only issue is that there isn't a on / off switch for the tractor. So my child can get on and just push the pedal and it goes - a little concerning that there isn't some sort of safety switch to stop this. Also, the pedal is right where they climb on, so I can envision the tractor jolting forward before the child is seated. Could be a huge safety issue
customer_reviews.author: ACS

customer_reviews.title: It's easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: The price seems high, but once you get it, you'll realize it's worth every penny. It's easy to set up. The battery lasts a REALLY long time. At least 60-90 minutes on a full charge. Our son loads up the trailer and follows us around the yard doing odd jobs. The pedal was a little tricky for him to figure out. It can be a little bit of a jolt when you first press the pedal. We've had no issues with it and our son loves it. He always wants to ride this thing in the summer time.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb Castine

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, solid and well made.
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our great grandson for Christmas. He loves it. We bought an additional battery so he can still play with it when one battery runs down and it is recharging. The tractor is sturdy, solid and well-made. However the instructions leave a lot to be desired and are hard to follow when putting the tractor together. We highly recommend it for little kids.
customer_reviews.author: Addicted to booksTop Contributor: Crochet

customer_reviews.title: Don't let people deter you it's not hard to put together
customer_reviews.text: Son loves it and regardless of what people say about the instructions it is easy to put together just by looking at the box...unless you have no common sense you may struggle. Just sayin' quit complaining to try and get a discount or deal. I will say though just be smart if you have hilly terrain its plastic and your child will topple over pending thier weight
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Carlsen

customer_reviews.title: Best One Out There!
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love the tractor! Our son got this for Easter and had not gotten off of it. We have gravel, grass, hills, and flat terrain; this tractor goes with no problem. We purchased the extra battery, you must charge for complete 18hrs before you use it! Battery life for us is great! It did take about 11/2 hrs to put together. The red cone shaped item is a tool, not a part!👍 the only thing I don't like is the trailer bed doesn't have any holes...like my son..he like putting dirt, rocks, sticks so when we wash is out the water stays, you have to top it over! Love this ride on toy!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Brooklyn

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the little one.
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old loves this. He rides this thing constantly,especially love the trailer. The trailer says it holds 22 lbs, wish it was a little more durable, the tires fall off on a regular. Other than the trailer issue, the actual tractor is great. He rides it through grass, through rocks, through dirt, hardly ever gets stuck.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my nephew and I couldn’t be more excited! The tractor arrived quickly. The instructions were a pain and assembly took quite a bit. I feel bad for the parents who regularly have to apply stickers to toys- you people have the patience of saints. Once constructed I was pleased with the results, though. I didn’t realize there was an actual working radio as well so that was a nice surprise. Very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Jenn Croteau

customer_reviews.title: 4 year old loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Fairly simple to assemble. The hood was a little difficult to get into place, but no problems with it since. I wish the battery was easier to unplug to charge. The charge lasts a long time and it drives great on turf, road base/gravel or pavement. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Erin T.

product_meta.title: Peg Perego John Deere Ground Force Tractor with Trailer
product_meta.description:
Style:StandardThe John Deere Ground Force takes outdoor play excitement to the next level! Kids will delight in listening to the FM radio while driving the large John Deere Ground Force Tractor with its extra large stake-side detachable trailer. Children will love loading up the trailer and delivering their treasures. The adjustable seat has flip-up armrests. Includes 2-Speeds; 2 1/4 or 4 1/2 mph, plus reverse. Parents control the speed with the 2nd gear lockout feature. 12-volt rechargeable battery and charger included. Made in the USA, in our Fort Wayne, Indiana factory using domestic and global components.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
John Deere Ground Force takes outdoor play excitement to the next level. Kids will delight in listening to the FM radio while driving the large John Deere Ground Force Tractor with full-size detachable trailer. 2 to 7 year olds will load up the extra large trailer and deliver their payload. The adjustable seat also has flip-up armrests. 2-Speeds, 2-1/4 or 4-1/2 miles per hour, plus reverse, automatic brakes and 4WD farm tractor wheels make driving a breeze. Parents control the speed with the 2nd gear lockout feature. 12-volt rechargeable battery and charger included. Made in USA in our Fort Wayne, Indiana factory using domestic and global components.
feature_bullets: 2 speeds plus reverse; 2¼ & 4½ mph. (4½ mph lockout for beginners)
Farm tractor wheels provide traction on grass, dirt, gravel or pavement.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars3,435 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
